channel.title: Coding problems
channel.description:
ya, so I'm trying to teach myself how to code through use of guides, yet I do have problems.
Mostly, the stuff I edit in/add to the Client.java file, don't take effect in the actual server. I tried adding teleport commands to the file, and i tried a few different formats, yet none of them worked. I also tried editing the login message, yet that didn't work either. I'm starting to think that the stuff I edit in the client.java file just don't work.
Anyone know what might be the problem?
I'm using the ddsspeced v1.0 source, and before you say it, yes, I did compile after saving the file and before running the source again.
I think it might just be client.java because I can edit whats in the shops, item stats, autospawn, and npc drops.

item.title: Coding problems
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

did u restart the server, does your compiler come up with any errors?

Read full topic
